assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The germline BRCA1/2 database is approved by North Manchester Research Ethics Committee (08/H1006/77). All women included in this study provided informed verbal and/or written consent to undergo germline BRCA1/2 testing.
